c74object.name: ears.out
c74object.digest: Message input for a patch loaded by ears.process~
c74object.description: Use the ears.in~ object inside a patch loaded by ears.process~ to create a multichannel signal inlet receiving data from the parent patch.

metadatalist.metadata: Andrea Agostini, partly based upon work by Alexander J. Harker

objarg.name: outlets
objarg.description: The numbers of the message outlets of ears.process~ (conted from 1, starting from the leftmost) to which to pass messages received by ears.in. Default is 1.

method.name: anything
method.digest: Output messages from the corresponding outlet of ears.process~
method.description: A message sent in any input of ears.out is sent out from the corresponding outlet of the ears.process~ containing the patch

method.name: bang
method.digest: Output bangs from the corresponding outlet of ears.process~
method.description: A bang sent in any input of ears.out is sent out from the corresponding outlet of the ears.process~ containing the patch

method.name: float
method.digest: Output floats from the corresponding outlet of ears.process~
method.description: A float sent in any input of ears.out is sent out from the corresponding outlet of the ears.process~ containing the patch

method.name: int
method.digest: Output integers from the corresponding outlet of ears.process~
method.description: An integer sent in any input of ears.out is sent out from the corresponding outlet of the ears.process~ containing the patch

method.name: list
method.digest: Output lists from the corresponding outlet of ears.process~
method.description: A list sent in any input of ears.out is sent out from the corresponding outlet of the ears.process~ containing the patch

attribute.name: direct
attribute.description: When the direct attribute is set to 0 (as per the default), at each iteration triggered by ears.process~ an llll is collected and, at the end of all the iterations, they are all chained together and output by ears.process~. If more than one llll is received by ears.out during one iteration, only the last one is collected.. When the direct attribute is set to 1, each llll received by ears.out is immediately output from the corresponding outlet of ears.process~.

attribute.name: outwrap
attribute.description:
If the outwrap attribute is set to 1 and the direct attribute is set to 0, the lllls collected at each iteration are returned as sublists, each wrapped in parentheses, rather than just chained together as per the default behavior, with outwrap set to 0.
If the direct attribute is set to 1, the outwrap attribute has no effect.
